short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon GO wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Pokemon GO background. Pokemon GO wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a new Pokemon GO wallpaper every time you open a tab.
2. Choose or favorite a Pokemon GO background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar.
4. Quickly access your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Simplify your browsing with shortcuts for your favorite sites.
10. Direct access to Google applications.
11. Explore additional themes with ease.
12. Share content effortlessly on social media platforms.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. One-click access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Pokemon GO tab.
